headline: Should Halliburton’s (HAL) Western Hemisphere Leadership Shift Reframe Its Technology and Margin Story?
summary: Halliburton Company recently announced that Casey Maxwell, a long-time Halliburton executive and current senior vice president North America Land, will become president, Western Hemisphere on February 1, 2026, succeeding Mark Richard, who will move into a senior advisor role to chairman, president, and CEO Jeff Miller. This leadership shift, combined with Halliburton’s emphasis on capital discipline, digital technology, and potential re-engagement in Venezuela, underscores how management is...
